name: Fox and Mushrooms
description:
Hi !

   This game was for a school project. I made it in one month, so I hope you'll like it ^^

    For the little story : the player is a fox who needs to pick the red mushrooms.

Have fun ! And if you want, you can support  me and my works, so don't hesitate to donate a tiny bit :)

 Thanks to Overshake for his help and Matthew  Pablo for the song Salt Marsh Bird.
